trans-unit.source: A <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.SessionEnding> event is raised when the user is trying to log off or shut the system down.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.SessionEnding>當使用者嘗試登出或關閉系統時，就會引發事件。

trans-unit.source: This <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents.SessionEnding> event can sometimes be canceled.
Setting the <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndingEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of a <xref:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndingEventArgs> to `false` will request that the session continue instead of ending.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndingEventArgs.Cancel%2A>屬性<xref:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndingEventArgs>至`false`會要求工作階段繼續而不是結束。

trans-unit.source: Making such a request provides no guarantee that the session will not end.
trans-unit.target: 在這類要求提供保證不會結束工作階段。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndReasons" /> that specifies how the session ends.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndReasons" />，指定工作階段如何結束。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndingEventArgs" /> class using the specified value indicating the type of session close event that is occurring.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的值初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndingEventArgs" /> 類別的新執行個體，該指定的值表示所發生的工作階段關閉事件的型別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to cancel the user request to end the session.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定數值，表示是否取消使用者結束工作階段的要求。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to cancel the user request to end the session; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 取消使用者結束工作階段的要求，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: When set to `true`, this property requests that the session continue to run.
trans-unit.target: 當設定為`true`，這個屬性會要求工作階段繼續執行。

trans-unit.source: It provides no guarantee that the session will not end.
trans-unit.target: 它會提供不保證不會結束工作階段。

trans-unit.source: Gets the reason the session is ending.
trans-unit.target: 取得工作階段結束的原因。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndReasons" /> values that specifies how the session is ending.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Win32.SessionEndReasons" /> 值，指定作業階段如何進行結束。
